Line 47: Line 47:
On February 27, 2009, ''[[Variety]]'' reported that actress [[Katie Cassidy]] has landed the Amanda-like role of sharp-tongued publicist Ella Flynn. Cassidy is known for her guest roles on shows like ''[[Supernatural (TV Series)| Supernatural]]'' and as Zoe on ''[[7th Heaven]].''
On February 27, 2009, ''[[Variety]]'' reported that actress [[Katie Cassidy]] has landed the Amanda-like role of sharp-tongued publicist Ella Flynn. Cassidy is known for her guest roles on shows like ''[[Supernatural (TV Series)| Supernatural]]'' and as Zoe on ''[[7th Heaven]].''
<ref>{{cite web|last=Schneider|first=Michael|title=CW casts 'Melrose Place,' 'Vampire'|url=http://www.variety.com/article/VR1118000691.html?categoryid=14&cs=1&nid=2565|publisher=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]|date=[[2009-02-27]]|accessdate=[[2009-03-01]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|last=Mitovich|first=Matt|title=Pilot News: Cassidy Hits ''Melrose'', McQueen Bites into ''Vampire''|url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Pilot-Cassidy-McQueen-1003538.aspx|publisher=[[TV Guide]]|date=[[2009-02-28]]|accessdate=[[2009-03-01]]}}</ref>
<ref>{{cite web|last=Schneider|first=Michael|title=CW casts 'Melrose Place,' 'Vampire'|url=http://www.variety.com/article/VR1118000691.html?categoryid=14&cs=1&nid=2565|publisher=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]|date=[[2009-02-27]]|accessdate=[[2009-03-01]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|last=Mitovich|first=Matt|title=Pilot News: Cassidy Hits ''Melrose'', McQueen Bites into ''Vampire''|url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Pilot-Cassidy-McQueen-1003538.aspx|publisher=[[TV Guide]]|date=[[2009-02-28]]|accessdate=[[2009-03-01]]}}</ref>
  +   +
On March 2, a CW insider informed TV website Zap2it.com that [[Mischa Barton]] of ''[[The O.C.]]'' fame is testing for a role on the show and that the network is "very excited about her." It is unclear what role she is testing for, however. <ref>{{cite web|last=Daly|first=Bridget|title=Mischa Barton to Star in Melrose Place Remake?|url=http://tv.hollyscoop.com/mischa-barton/mischa-barton-to-star-in-melrose-place-remake_1575.aspx|date=[[2009-03-02]]|accessdate=[[2009-03-03]]}}</ref>
On March 9, ''[[Entertainment Weekly]]'' reported that singer/actress [[Ashlee Simpson-Wentz]] was the latest new tenant to be moving into Melrose Place. She will portray the role of Violet Foster, small-town girl who comes to L.A. with a secret. The character parallels a combination between ''Melrose'' originals Sydney Andrews ([[Laura Leighton]]) and Sandy Harling ([[Amy Locane]]).<ref>{{cite news |first=Michael |last=Ausiello |coauthors= |title=Scoop: Ashlee Simpson moves into 'Melrose Place' |work=[[Entertainment Weekly]] |page= |date=March 9, 2009 |accessdate= |quote= |url=http://ausiellofiles.ew.com/2009/03/scoop-ashlee-si.html }}</ref>
On March 9, ''[[Entertainment Weekly]]'' reported that singer/actress [[Ashlee Simpson-Wentz]] was the latest new tenant to be moving into Melrose Place. She will portray the role of Violet Foster, small-town girl who comes to L.A. with a secret. The character parallels a combination between ''Melrose'' originals Sydney Andrews ([[Laura Leighton]]) and Sandy Harling ([[Amy Locane]]).<ref>{{cite news |first=Michael |last=Ausiello |coauthors= |title=Scoop: Ashlee Simpson moves into 'Melrose Place' |work=[[Entertainment Weekly]] |page= |date=March 9, 2009 |accessdate= |quote= |url=http://ausiellofiles.ew.com/2009/03/scoop-ashlee-si.html }}</ref>
  +   +
On March 12, ''[[The Hollywood Reporter]]'' has stated Mischa Barton will not be joining the cast of ''Melrose Place'' but that however she has been cast on another show for the Network's fall line up, ''A Beautiful Life''.<ref>{{cite news |first=Nellie |last=Andreeva |coauthors= |title=Mischa Barton joins CW's 'Beautiful Life' |work=[[The Hollywood Reporter]] |page= |date=March 12, 2009 |accessdate= |quote= |url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/news/e3i25f8fdbe2f089f965935d3b724bb3671 }}</ref>
On March 17, ''[[Cloverfield]]'' star [[Jessica Lucas]] has been cast to play the wealthy and beautiful elementary school teacher Riley Richmond according to ''[[The Hollywood Reporter]]''. Lucas recently guest starred on ''[[90210]]'' as undercover cop Kimberly McIntyre. <ref>{{cite news |first=Nellie |last=Andreeva |coauthors= |title=Jessica Lucas moves into CW's 'Melrose Place' |work=[[The Hollywood Reporter]] |page= |date=March 17, 2009 |accessdate= |quote= |url=http://http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/news/e3i9195894d101675e334f75bb6c05e61e4 }}</ref>
On March 17, ''[[Cloverfield]]'' star [[Jessica Lucas]] has been cast to play the wealthy and beautiful elementary school teacher Riley Richmond according to ''[[The Hollywood Reporter]]''. Lucas recently guest starred on ''[[90210]]'' as undercover cop Kimberly McIntyre. <ref>{{cite news |first=Nellie |last=Andreeva |coauthors= |title=Jessica Lucas moves into CW's 'Melrose Place' |work=[[The Hollywood Reporter]] |page= |date=March 17, 2009 |accessdate= |quote= |url=http://http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/news/e3i9195894d101675e334f75bb6c05e61e4 }}</ref>
